p: The major flavanone glycoside in the citrus peel is hesperidin [ 115]. Docking scores of this compound with S protein and M pro were −10.4 and −8.3, respectively. Utomo et al. [ 116] have docked hesperidin against S protein (−9.6) and M pro (−13.51). Chen et al. [ 117] revealed that the best hesperidin position against SARS-CoV-2 3C-like protease (3CL pro) was −10.1. Adem et al. [ 118] found that the ability of hesperidin was better than that of nelfinavir. Based on this finding, it can be seen that hesperidin has great potential to be a candidate for drugs, but its low oral bioavailability is a problem.
